definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Ordinary people responded positively to the pilgrims who came into their villages.
sentences.chinese: 老百姓对来到他们村庄的朝圣者明确地作出了反应。

sentences.english: Ruled by the Turks until1916, Jidda has long been used as a port by Moslem pilgrims making the journey to Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 吉达长期以来是穆斯林朝圣者通往麦加城的旅行港口。

sentences.english: The palmer has been Guyon's guide up to this point, his teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他的老师，即那位朝圣者只将他带到洞口。

sentences.english: Many Moslem pilgrims go to Mecca every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年很多回教朝圣者到麦加。

sentences.english: Pilgrims no longer come to leave notes or flowers.
sentences.chinese: 朝圣者也不再来此留言或献花。

sentences.english: Bue one man loved the pilgrim soul in you.
sentences.chinese: 唯独一爱你那朝圣者的心。

sentences.english: Have not saints lips, and holy palmers too?
sentences.chinese: 圣者与朝圣者难道没有唇？

sentences.english: Many of the worshippers were from the neighboring state of Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 很多朝圣者来自临近的旁遮普邦。

sentences.english: The pontiff was speaking to pilgrims at his summer palace.
sentences.chinese: 教皇正在其夏宫向朝圣者布教。

sentences.english: As palmers' chat makes short their pilgrimage.
sentences.chinese: 正如朝圣者闲谈，使漫漫长途缩短。

sentences.english: The term“turkey”was used by the Pilgrims to mean any sort of wild fowl.
sentences.chinese: 当时，朝圣者用“火鸡”一词来代表各种野禽。

sentences.english: Every goat year, waves of pilgrims come to the Holy Lake. It is really an exceptionally grand occasion.
sentences.chinese: 每逢羊年转湖的朝圣者人流如潮，盛况空前。

sentences.english: Muslim worshippers circle the Kaaba at Mecca's Grand Mosque during Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林朝圣者聚集在麦加的大清真寺周围。

sentences.english: Only the most determined make the final journey up valley to the farthest extremity of the river.
sentences.chinese: 只有最虔诚的朝圣者才会攀抵恒河末端最远处的山谷。

sentences.english: Many pilgrims are releasing lives at the Lives' Liberation pond beside the Parama Bodhi Stupa.
sentences.chinese: 边的放生池，许多朝圣者正在放生。

definition: to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
Jokhang, main Buddhist temple in Lhasa, a sacred place of Tibetan Buddhism
Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet/also called Mount Kailash
